content.question: Which of the following claims does Napoleon make about religion in the document al-Jabarti quotes in the second paragraph?

choices.label: The French had come to convert Egypt to Christianity.
The French had come to abolish Islam.
The French did not wish to change the religion of the people of Egypt.
The French state was not based on the principles of the Enlightenment.

content.answer: The French did not wish to change the religion of the people of Egypt.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
